Articles.Content:
This is a super lander challenge (Obviously).

What you need to do is design a ship that takes off, Rendezvous with a ship already in orbit, lands back on Kerbin, takes off again and rendezvous with that same ship. Extra points for less stages, and more Kerbals.

Any balanced sort of mod is allowed (and yes, I'll even let you use mechjeb)

Leader board-

Edited September 17, 2012 by Captisaac21198
